<script type="text/javascript">
  //------------------------------------------------------------
  // Alert 다이얼그램(메시지창)- [확인] 1개 버튼형태
  // strTitle : 제목
  // strContent : 내용
  // strTheme : 버튼 색상(red, black) default : black
  //------------------------------------------------------------
  function fmAlert(strTitle, strContent, strTheme) {
    return $.confirm({
      title: (strTitle == "" ? "" : strTitle),
      titleClass: (strTitle == "" ? "" : 'confirm-title-area'),
      content: strContent,
      useBootstrap: false,
      backgroundDismiss: false,
      backgroundDismissAnimation: 'glow',
      boxWidth: '300px',
      buttons: {
        confirm: {
          text: '확인',
          btnClass: (strTheme == "red" ? "btn-confirm-single btn-confirm-color" : strTheme == "black" ? "btn-confirm-single btn-confirm-black" : "btn-confirm-single btn-confirm-black"),
          keys: ['enter']
        }
      }
    });
  }
  //------------------------------------------------------------
  // Alert 다이얼그램(메시지창) - [취소],[확인] 2개 버튼형태
  // strTitle : 제목
  // strContent : 내용
  // strTheme : 버튼 색상(color, black) default : black
  //------------------------------------------------------------
  function fmAlert2Btn(strTitle, strContent, strTheme) {
    return $.confirm({
      title: (strTitle == "" ? "" : strTitle),
      titleClass: (strTitle == "" ? "" : 'confirm-title-area'),
      content: strContent,
      useBootstrap: false,
      backgroundDismiss: false,
      backgroundDismissAnimation: 'glow',
      boxWidth: '300px',
      buttons: {
        cancel: {
          text: '취소',
          btnClass: 'btn-confirm-left btn-confirm-negative',
          keys: ['esc']
        },
        confirm: {
          text: '확인',
          btnClass: (strTheme == "color" ? "btn-confirm-right btn-confirm-color" : strTheme == "black" ? "btn-confirm-right btn-confirm-black" : "btn-confirm-right btn-confirm-black"),
          keys: ['enter']
        }
      }
    });
  }

</script>

  var defaultObj = {};
  defaultObj.page_category = 'today';

  defaultObj.is_from_app = false;
  //defaultObj.ccsp_id = undefined;
  //defaultObj.is_car_registered = undefined;
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  window.dataLayer.push({
    defaultObj: defaultObj
  });
</script>

<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
<script>
  (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
    w[l] = w[l] || []; w[l].push({
      'gtm.start':
        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
    }); var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
      j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : ''; j.async = true; j.src =
        'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl; f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
  })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-MB94R7G');
</script>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->

<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->

<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
  gtag('js', new Date());
  gtag('config', 'G-G7BWSC7NZY');
</script>

  if (!wcs_add) var wcs_add = {};
  wcs_add["wa"] = "11ea9d85f136f40";
  if (window.wcs) {
    wcs_do();
  }
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">
  /**
  * Google Tag Manager param click product event
  * @param a: item_id
  * @param b: iem_name
  * @param c: price
  * @param d: currency
  * @param e: category
  * @param f: category2
  * @param g: location_id
  * @param h: sale_site [pointshop | giftshop | carmall]
  */
  function setGoogleAnalytics(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h) {
    //console.log('select item', a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);

    var item = [];
    var prdObj = {
      item_id: a
      , item_name: b
      , currency: d
      , item_category: e
      , item_category2: f
      , location_id: g
    };

    if (c) {
      prdObj.price = c;
    }

    item.push(prdObj);
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    dataLayer.push({ ecommerce: null });
    dataLayer.push({
      event: 'select_item'
      , item_type: (
        h == 'pointshop' ? '일반' :
          h == 'giftshop' ? '선물하기' :
            h == 'carmall' ? '카몰' : ''
      )
      , page_area: g
      , ecommerce: { items: item }
    });

  }

  /**
   * Google Tag Manager param click more button event
   * @param a: url
   * @param b: page_area
   */
  function setGoogleAnalyticsClickMore(a, b) {
    //console.log('click more button', a, b);

    var eventObj = {
      click_url: a
      , page_area: b
    };
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'click_view_more',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      eventObj: eventObj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

  /**
   * Google Tag Manager param click banner event
   * @param a: banner_type
   * @param b: page_area
   * @param c: banner_name
   * @param d: click_url
   */
  function setGoogleAnalyticsClickBanner(a, b, c, d) {
    //console.log('click banner', a, b, c, d);

    var eventObj = {
      banner_type: a
      , page_area: b
    };

    if (c) { eventObj.banner_name = c; }
    if (d) { eventObj.click_url = d; }

    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'select_banner',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      eventObj: eventObj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

  //Google Tag Manager param view banner event
  function setGoogleAnalyticsViewBanner(obj) {
    //console.log('view banner', obj);

    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'view_banner',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      eventObj: obj                  //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

  //Google Tag Manager param search
  function setGoogleAnalyticsSearch(obj) {
    //console.log('search', obj)

    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'search',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      eventObj: obj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

  // share item
  function setGoogleAnalyticsShare(obj) {
    //console.log('share item', obj);

      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'share_item',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      eventObj: obj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }


  /**
   * event info(view_event_detail)
   * @param a: event_name
   */
  function setGoogleAnalyticsClickEvent(a) {
    //console.log('view event detail', a);

    var eventObj = {
      event_name: a
    };
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'view_event_detail',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      event_info: eventObj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

  function setGoogleAnalyticsEventInfo(obj) {
    //console.log('view event', obj);

    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({ eventObj: null });
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'event',                           //일반 이벤트 공통 트리거 (고정값)
      event_name: 'view_event',   //이벤트 이름 (변수)
      event_info: obj                    //이벤트 파라메터 전달
    });

  }

</script>



	<script type="text/javascript">
    var FMK_DOMAIN_NM = '.hyundai.com';
    //capsLock on/off check
    document.onkeydown = function (e) { //check if capslock key was pressed in the whole window
      e = e || event;
      var obj = $(':focus').attr('id');
      if (typeof (window.lastpress) === 'undefined') { window.lastpress = e.timeStamp; }
      if (typeof (window.capsLockEnabled) !== 'undefined') {
        if (e.keyCode == 20 && e.timeStamp > window.lastpress + 50) {
          window.capsLockEnabled = !window.capsLockEnabled;
          $('#capslockp_' + obj).toggle();
        }
        window.lastpress = e.timeStamp;
        //sometimes this function is called twice when pressing capslock once, so I use the timeStamp to fix the problem
      }
    };

    function check_capslock(e) { //check what key was pressed
      $('.capslockp').hide();
      var obj = $(':focus').attr('id');
      var s = String.fromCharCode(e.keyCode);
      if (s.toUpperCase() === s && s.toLowerCase() !== s && !e.shiftKey) {
        window.capsLockEnabled = true;
        if ($('#capslockp_' + obj).length == 0) {
          $('#' + obj).after('<p class="capslockp text-guide" id="capslockp_' + obj + '" style="display:none; margin-top: 5px;">CapsLock이 켜져 있습니다.</p>');
        }
        $('#capslockp_' + obj).show();
      }
      else {
        window.capsLockEnabled = false;
        $('#capslockp_' + obj).hide();
      }
    }

    function check_capslock_form(obj) {
      obj.keypress(check_capslock);
    }

    //금액 국가별 변환 출력
    function SET_EXCHANGE_MNY(lang, price) {
      var retData;
      $.ajax({
        url: 'ajax?action=setexchange_mny',
        type: 'POST',
        dataType: 'html',
        async: false,
        data: {
          lang: lang
          , price: price
        },
        success: function (data) {
          retData = data;
        }
      });
      return retData;
    }

    $(function () {
      ////마우스 우클릭 방지
      //$(document).on('contextmenu', function (e) {
      //  fmAlert('', '마우스 오른쪽 버튼은 사용할 수 없습니다.', 'black');
      //  return false;
      //});
    });

    $(document).ready(function () {
      check_capslock_form($('#cust_pw, #pw01, #pw02, #user_pw, #user_pw_current, #user_pw01, #user_pw02')); //applies the capslock check to all input tags
    });
  </script>
</head>

<script type="text/javascript">
  // 카몰 상품 이동처리
  // pc_url(PC이동 URL), mo_url(모바일이동 URL), app_url(앱이동 URL), isNew(새탭(창)여부, true/false)
  function goCarlikeMall(pc_url, mo_url, app_url, isNew) {
			//fmAlert('', '서비스 준비 중입니다.', 'black');
			//return;

			if (isNew) {
				window.open("/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(pc_url)));
			} else {
				//location.href = "/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(pc_url));
				location.replace("/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(pc_url)));
			}

  }

  // 임시 테스트용
  function goCarlikeMall2(pc_url, mo_url, app_url) {
    var isApp = document.getElementById("apptest").checked;
    if (isApp) {
      location.href = "/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(app_url)) + "&app=true"
    } else {
      var isMobile = /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|macintosh/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ? true : false;
      jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
        if (!isMobile) {
          //PC
          location.href = "/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(pc_url));
        } else {
          //MOBILE
          location.href = "/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=" + btoa(encodeURIComponent(mo_url));
        }
      });
    }
  }

  // 로그인
  function goLoginInit(tp) {
    location.href = "/main/auton?action=login&mbrType=" + tp
    // var isApp = document.getElementById("apptest").checked;
    // if(isApp){
    // 	location.href = "/main/auton?action=login&app=true&mbrType="+tp
    // }else{
    // 	location.href = "/main/auton?action=login&mbrType="+tp
    // }

  }

  //로그아웃
  function chkLogout() {
    var msg;
    var confirm = fmAlert2Btn('', '로그아웃하시겠습니까?', 'color');
    confirm.buttons.confirm.action = function () {
      $.ajax({
        url: "/main/ajax?action=logout",
        type: 'POST',
        dataType: 'html',
        success: function (retDATA) {
          if (retDATA == 'TRUE') {
            //location.href="/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=https://shop.hyundai.com";
            location.href = "/main/auton?action=link&tp=&url=/";
            return;
          }
          else {
            fmAlert('', '로그아웃에 실패하였습니다.<br />확인 후  다시 이용하세요.', 'black');
            return;
          }
        },
        error: function (xhr, status, error) {
          if (error) {
            fmAlert('', '오류발생! - 시스템관리자에게 문의하십시오!<br />[' + xhr.status + '],[' + status + '],[' + error + ']', 'black');
            return;
          } else if (xhr.status == 403) {
            fmAlert('', '장시간 미사용으로 자동로그아웃되었습니다.<br />재로그인하여 주시기 바랍니다.', 'black');
            return;
          } else if (xhr.status == 500) {
            fmAlert('', '시스템에 오류가 발생하였습니다.<br />다시 시도하여 주세요.', 'black');
            return;
          } else {
            fmAlert('', '오류가 발생하였습니다. 다시 시도하여 주세요.<br />(' + error + ')', 'black');
            return;
          }
        }
      });
    }
  }
</script>
<!-- E: header-bottom -->



</header>
<!-- E: header -->

<style type="text/css">
  .point-prd-loading {position: absolute;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 100%;z-index: 299;-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(0px);backdrop-filter: blur(0px);backdrop-filter: 0;text-align: center;}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
  /**
   * 추천상품 더보기
   * @param obj button object
   */
  function getRecommendInfo(obj) {
    var trandnum = $('#trandnum').val()
      , strUrl = '/pointshop/search?action=list&searchtp=recommend&trandnum=' + trandnum;
    location.href = strUrl;

    /**
     * Google Tag Manager param click view more
     * @param a: pc_url
     * @param b: mo_url
     * @param c: app_url
     * @param d: url
     * @param e: page_area
     * @param f: tp[C:carmall | Etc]
     */
    setGoogleAnalyticsClickMore('', '', '', strUrl, 'section.main-mypoint', '');
  }

  //보유 포인트 효과
  function numberCounter(target_frame, target_number) {
    this.count = 0;
    this.diff = 0;
    this.target_count = parseInt(target_number);
    this.target_frame = document.getElementById(target_frame);
    this.timer = null;
    this.counter();
  };

  numberCounter.prototype.counter = function () {
    var self = this;
    this.diff = this.target_count - this.count;

    if (this.diff > 0) {
      self.count += Math.ceil(this.diff / 5);
    }

    this.target_frame.innerHTML = this.count.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',');

    if (this.count < this.target_count) {
      this.timer = setTimeout(function () { self.counter(); }, 20);
    } else {
      clearTimeout(this.timer);
    }
  };
</script>

      //베스트
      function bestSlide() {
        var bestswiper = new Swiper('.main-best-swiper', {
          slidesPerView: 1.5,
          spaceBetween: 15,
          pagination: false,
          navigation: false,
          freeMode: true,
          observeParents: true,
          observer: true,
          loop: false,

            dragSize: 'auto',
            el: '.swiper-scrollbar',
            draggable: true,
          },
          breakpoints: {

              slidesPerView: 5,
              spaceBetween: 20,
            },
            601: {
              slidesPerView: 3.5,
              spaceBetween: 15,
            },
            426: {
              slidesPerView: 2.5,
              spaceBetween: 15,
            },
          },
        });
      }

	<script type="text/javascript">
    function hdaySlick() {
			$('.hday-slick').slick({
        autoplay: true,
        autoplaySpeed: 3000,
        infinite: true,
        arrows: true,
        prevArrow: $('.hday-prev'),
        nextArrow: $('.hday-next'),
        dots: true,
        dotsClass: 'hday-paging',
        customPaging: function (slider, i) {
          return '<span>' + (i + 1) + '</span>' + ' / ' + slider.slideCount;
        },
        responsive: [
          {
            breakpoint: 768,
            settings: {
              arrows: false,
            }
          },
          {
            breakpoint: 641,
            settings: {
              mobileFirst: false,
              centerMode: true,
              slidesToShow: 1,
            }
          }
        ],
      });
    }

    var hday_timer;
    function init_hday_count() {
      var countdown_items = $('[data-bind=countdown]')
        , isTimeOver = true;

      $(countdown_items).each(function (i, e) {
        // 현재요소의 남은 초
        // 현재요소의 변환된 시/분/초
        let remain_sec = $(e).data('value');
				let remain_gdscd = $(e).data('gdscd');

        if (remain_sec > 0) {
          $(e).data('value', remain_sec -= 1);  // 현재요소의 남은 초 - 1
          $(e).text(prtCoutn(remain_sec, remain_gdscd));  //time output
        }
      });

      $(countdown_items).each(function (i, e) {
        if (parseInt($(e).data('value')) > 0) {
          isTimeOver = false;
          return false;
        }
      });

      if (isTimeOver) {
        clearInterval(hday_timer)
      }
    }

    function prtCoutn(time, gdscd) {
      let hour = parseInt(time / 3600);
      let min = parseInt((time % 3600) / 60);
      let sec = time % 60;
			let day = parseInt(hour / 24);  //잔여 일수가 1이상일 경우 남은 일수 출력하기 위한 param
      //let txt = String(hour).padStart(2, '0').slice(-2) + ':' + String(min).padStart(2, '0') + ':' + String(sec).padStart(2, '0');
      let $obj = $('[data-hdaygdscd=' + gdscd + ']');

			let txt = String(hour).padStart(2, '0').slice(-2) + ':' + String(min).padStart(2, '0') + ':' + String(sec).padStart(2, '0');


			if (hour > 24) { //잔여 일수가 1이상일 경우 남은 일수 출력
				txt = day + '일 ' + String((day == 1 & (min > 0 || sec > 0) ? hour - 24 : hour % 24)).padStart(2, '0').slice(-2) + ':' + String(min).padStart(2, '0') + ':' + String(sec).padStart(2, '0');
			}

      if (hour == 0 && min == 0 && sec == 0) {
        txt = '판매종료';

        //판매종료의 경우 링크 초기화
        $obj.find('a').attr('href', 'javascript:void(0);').attr('onclick', 'fmAlert("", "판매종료된 상품입니다.", "black");');
      }

      return txt;
    }

    hday_timer = setInterval(init_hday_count, 1000);
    hdaySlick();
  </script>

      <!-- E: sec-hday -->

      <!-- S: sec-story -->

		<script type="text/javascript">
      // $(document).ready(function () {
      // 	storySlide();
      // });
      $(window).resize(function () {
        //storySlide();
      });
      function storySlide() {
        //스토리
        var storyswiper = new Swiper(".main-story-swiper", {
          slidesPerView: 1,
          spaceBetween: 20,
          pagination: false,
          navigation: false,
          freeMode: true,
          scrollbar: {
            el: '.swiper-scrollbar',
            draggable: true,
          },
          breakpoints: {
            641: {
              slidesPerView: 2,
              spaceBetween: 40,
            },
          },
        });
      }
      storySlide();
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  /**
   * 회원 포인트의 추천상품
   * @param tp
   */
  function getBestRecommend(tp) {
    var trandnum = $('#trandnum').val();  //현재 출력된 데이터 제외하기 위한 param
    $.ajax({
      url: '/main/ajax?action=recommend_product_none',
      type: 'GET',
      dataType: 'html',
      data: {
        tp: tp
        , trandnum: trandnum
      },
      beforeSend: function () {
        //showSpinner(true);
        $(".point-prd-loading").show();
      },
      complete: function () {
        //showSpinner(false);
        $(".point-prd-loading").hide();
      },
      success: function (retDATA) {
        if ($('#recommend_list').hasClass('slick-initialized')) {
          $('#recommend_list').slick('unslick');
        }


          $('#recommend_list').empty().append(retDATA);
          $('#trandnum').val('');  //trand_num


        //pointSlick();
      },
      error: function (xhr, status, error) {
        $(".point-prd-loading").show();
      }
    });
  }

  function pshopSlick() {
		$('.main-pshop-top-row').not('.slick-initialized').slick({
			arrows: false,
			slidesToShow: 2.5,
			infinite: false,
			mobileFirst: true,
			rows: 2,
			responsive: [
				{
					breakpoint: 768,
					settings: "unslick"
				}
			]
		});
  }

  $(function () {
    $('#info_cate').find('button').unbind('click').click(function () {
      $('#cate').val($(this).data('cate'));
      $(this).closest('li').addClass('current').siblings('li').removeClass('current');
      getList('F', true);
    });
  });

  $(document).ready(function () {
    //INFO_EVENT();	//이벤트
    pshopSlick();
    $('.mobile-back').hide();

		// 리스트 IMG 높이값
    var winW = $(window).width();

    if (winW < 1025) {
      var width = 320;
      var height = 200;
      var maxWidth = $(window).width();
      var ratio = (height * maxWidth) / width;

      $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('width', maxWidth);
      $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('height', ratio);
      $('.mainvisual-item').css('height', ratio);

      itemResize();
    } else {
      var maxWidth = $(window).width();
      $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('width', '100%');
      $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('height', '700px');
      $('.mainvisual-item').css('height', '700px');
    }

    $(window).resize(function () {
      var winW = $(window).width();

      if (winW < 1025) {
        var width = 320;
        var height = 200;
        var maxWidth = $(window).width();
        var ratio = (height * maxWidth) / width;

        $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('width', maxWidth);
        $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('height', ratio);
        $('.mainvisual-item').css('height', ratio);

        itemResize();
      } else {
        $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('width', '100%');
        $('.mainvisual-wrap').css('height', '700px');
        $('.mainvisual-item').css('height', '700px');
      }

      if (typeof(pshopSlick) == 'function') pshopSlick();
      if (typeof(bestSlide) == 'function') bestSlide();
      if (typeof(storySlide) == 'function') storySlide();
      if (typeof(pointSlick) == 'function') pointSlick();
      if (typeof(mainbrand) == 'function') mainbrand();

      // bestSlide();
      // storySlide();
      // pshopSlick();
      // pointSlick();
      // mainbrand();
    });


  });


</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  /* *
   * main popup
   * setCookie, getCookie
   * */

  function jGetCookie(name) {
    var arg = name + "=";
    var alen = arg.length;
    var clen = document.cookie.length;
    var i = 0;

    while (i < clen) {	//while open
      var j = i + alen;
      if (document.cookie.substring(i, j) == arg) {
        return getCookieVal(j);
      }
      i = document.cookie.indexOf(" ", i) + 1;
      if (i == 0) {
        break;
      }
    }	//while close
    return null;
  }


  function getCookieVal(offset) {
    var endstr = document.cookie.indexOf(";", offset);
    if (endstr == -1) {
      endstr = document.cookie.length;
    }
    return unescape(document.cookie.substring(offset, endstr));
  }

  /*
  //selected pop 상위노출
  var num_zIndex = 99999;
  function pop_select(obj) {
    num_zIndex++;
    $('#popup_' + obj).css('z-index', num_zIndex);
    //console.log(num_zIndex)
  }
  */
  var bpopup = new Array;
</script>




<script type="text/javascript">
  function goBack() {
    // if (document.referrer.indexOf("/sso") != -1) {
    //   location.href = "https://myhyundai.hmc.co.kr";
    // } else
    if (document.referrer) {
      history.back();
    } else {
      location.href = "https://myhyundai.hmc.co.kr";
    }
  }
</script>

<div id="bogo_event">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function () {
    getBogoEventChk();

    $(document).on("click", "#bogo_event .btn-secret", function(){
      var num = $(this).data("bind");
      $('#popup_secret_'+num+'').addClass('active');
    })

    $(document).on("click", "#day_view", function(){
      var num = $(this).data("bind");
      $('#popup_secret_'+num+'').removeClass('active');
      // $('.sticky-secret').show();
      $.cookie("popup_secret", num, {expires:1});
    })

    $(document).on("click", "#bogo_event .btn-close", function(){
      var num = $(this).data("bind");
      $('#popup_secret_'+num+'').removeClass('active');
      // $('.sticky-secret').show();
    })

  });

  // chk
  function getBogoEventChk() {
    $.ajax({
      url: '/main/ajax?action=bogo_chk',
      type: 'GET',
      dataType: 'JSON',
      beforeSend: function () {
      },
      complete: function () {
      },
      success: function (data) {
        if (data.status == "OK"){
          document.getElementById("bogo_event").innerHTML = data.CONTENT;
          if ($.cookie("popup_secret") === data.ID){
            $('#popup_secret_'+data.ID+'').removeClass('active');
            // $('.sticky-secret').show();
          }else{
            setTimeout(function() {
              $('#popup_secret_'+data.ID+'').addClass('active');
              // $('.sticky-secret').hide();
            }, 50);

          }
        }
      },
      error: function (xhr, status, error) {
      }
    });
  }

</script>





<!-- E: 이벤트 1+2+3 -->
